code: import i18n from'i18next';import{initReactI18next}from'react-i18next';import resources from'./languages';var AVAILABLE_LANGUAGES=['en','tr'];var DEFAULT_LANGUAGE='tr';i18n.use(initReactI18next).init({lng:DEFAULT_LANGUAGE,fallbackLng:DEFAULT_LANGUAGE,supportedLngs:AVAILABLE_LANGUAGES,resources:resources,react:{useSuspense:false,transSupportBasicHtmlNodes:true},interpolation:{escapeValue:false}});export default i18n;
